mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWCOMMENTS (COMMENTID, COMMENTCONTENTS, COMMENTDATE, REVIEWID, USERNUM) VALUES (COMMENTID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{commentContents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{reviewId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: SELECT RC.COMMENTID, RC.COMMENTCONTENTS, RC.COMMENTDATE, RC.REVIEWID, RC.USERNUM, U.USERNAME FROM REVIEWCOMMENTS RC JOIN USERS U ON RC.USERNUM = U.USERNUM WHERE RC.REVIEWID = #{reviewId} ORDER BY RC.COMMENTDATE ASC
